headline: E-Commerce Growth Is Back: 2 Smart Stocks to Buy
summary: It makes sense to try and get ahead of the crowd, and that's why stocks like GXO Logistics (NYSE: GXO) and Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) should be high on investors' lists of stocks to look at.  Both companies look set to benefit from a pickup in growth in e-commerce spending that will encourage capital spending in the future.  In truth, the growth in e-commerce spending has never really gone away.
